description.zh-cn: 中国山西省忻州市所辖的一个县。东、南、北三面环山，中部和西部为忻定盆地内的平川。主要经济支柱产业是锻压业，有“中国锻造之乡”的荣誉称号。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Xinzhou City, Shanxi Province, China. It is surrounded by mountains on the east, south, and north, with the central and western parts being plains within the Xinding Basin. Its main economic pillar is the forging industry, earning it the honorary title of 'China's Forging Hometown'.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县所在的国家。
description.en: The country where Dingxiang County is located.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县所属的省份。
description.en: The province to which Dingxiang County belongs.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县当前所属的地级市。
description.en: The prefecture-level city to which Dingxiang County currently belongs.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县县长。
description.en: County Mayor of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县县委书记。
description.en: County Party Secretary of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县人大主任。
description.en: Director of the People's Congress of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县政协主席。
description.en: Chairman of the CPPCC of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，在此期间定襄县所在地为阳曲县。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty during which the area of Dingxiang County was known as Yangqu County.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期位于现定襄县境内的县。
description.en: A county located in the present-day territory of Dingxiang County during the Western Han Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的行政区划，管辖阳曲县。
description.en: An administrative division during the Western Han Dynasty that administered Yangqu County.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，定襄县在此期间设立。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty during which Dingxiang County was established.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末代皇帝，建安二十年（215年）在阳曲故城置定襄县。
description.en: The last emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty, who established Dingxiang County at the former site of Yangqu County in the 20th year of Jian'an (215 AD).

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的行政区划，管辖定襄县。
description.en: An administrative division during the Eastern Han Dynasty that administered Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北朝之一，曾废除定襄县。
description.en: One of the Northern Dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China, which once abolished Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北朝之一。
description.en: One of the Northern Dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China.

description.zh-cn: 北周时期曾迁治于今定襄县城的县。
description.en: A county whose seat was moved to the location of present-day Dingxiang County during the Northern Zhou Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，于武德四年（621年）复置定襄县。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty that re-established Dingxiang County in the 4th year of Wude (621 AD).

description.zh-cn: 历史上管辖定襄县的州，也是现今忻州市的前身。
description.en: A historical prefecture that administered Dingxiang County, and the predecessor of modern Xinzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝天宝年间管辖定襄县的郡。
description.en: A commandery that administered Dingxiang County during the Tianbao era of the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代，曾将定襄县并入秀容县后又复置。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty that merged Dingxiang County into Xiurong County and later re-established it.

description.zh-cn: 北宋时期曾合并定襄县的县。
description.en: A county that merged with Dingxiang County during the Northern Song Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北宋哲宗的年号，在此期间定襄县被复置。
description.en: The era name of Emperor Zhezong of the Northern Song, during which Dingxiang County was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代朝代。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期管辖定襄县的行政区划。
description.en: An administrative division that administered Dingxiang County during the Ming and Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后管辖定襄县的行政区划。
description.en: An administrative division that administered Dingxiang County after the founding of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后管辖定襄县的行政区划。
description.en: An administrative division that administered Dingxiang County after the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后管辖定襄县的行政区划，忻县地区之后。
description.en: An administrative division that administered Dingxiang County after the Reform and Opening-up, succeeding Xinxian Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 定襄县现为忻州市辖县。
description.en: Dingxiang County is currently under the jurisdiction of Xinzhou City.

description.zh-cn: 忻州市是山西省下辖的地级市。
description.en: Xinzhou is a prefecture-level city under the jurisdiction of Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 山西省是中国的省份之一。
description.en: Shanxi is one of the provinces of China.

description.zh-cn: 张生明担任定襄县县长。
description.en: Zhang Shengming serves as the County Mayor of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 张文斌担任定襄县县委书记。
description.en: Zhang Wenbin serves as the County Party Secretary of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 曲建成担任定襄县人大主任。
description.en: Qu Jiancheng serves as the Director of the People's Congress of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 郭丽云担任定襄县政协主席。
description.en: Guo Liyun serves as the Chairman of the CPPCC of Dingxiang County.

description.zh-cn: 东汉汉献帝建安二十年（215年），在阳曲故城设置了定襄县。
description.en: In the 20th year of Jian'an (215 AD), Emperor Xian of the Eastern Han Dynasty established Dingxiang County at the former site of Yangqu city.

description.zh-cn: 东汉建安二十年（215年），定襄县设立，属新兴郡。
description.en: In 215 AD, Dingxiang County was established and belonged to Xinxing Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 北齐时期废除了定襄县。
description.en: Dingxiang County was abolished during the Northern Qi Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北周时期，平寇县迁来治理，治所位于今定襄县城。
description.en: During the Northern Zhou Dynasty, Pingkou County was moved to govern the area, with its seat located in present-day Dingxiang County town.

description.zh-cn: 唐武德四年（621年）复置定襄县。
description.en: Dingxiang County was re-established in the 4th year of Wude of the Tang Dynasty (621 AD).

description.zh-cn: 定襄县在唐代和北宋元祐年间复置后均隶属于忻州。
description.en: Dingxiang County was subordinate to Xinzhou during both the Tang Dynasty and after its re-establishment in the Yuanyou era of the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝天宝年间，定襄县隶属于定襄郡。
description.en: During the Tianbao era of the Tang Dynasty, Dingxiang County was subordinate to Dingxiang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 北宋咸宁五年（1072年），定襄县被并入秀容县。
description.en: In the 5th year of Xianning of the Northern Song Dynasty (1072 AD), Dingxiang County was merged into Xiurong County.

description.zh-cn: 北宋元祐（1086-1093）年间，定襄县被复置。
description.en: During the Yuanyou era (1086-1093) of the Northern Song Dynasty, Dingxiang County was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 明、清时期，定襄县隶属于忻州直隶州。
description.en: During the Ming and Qing dynasties, Dingxiang County was subordinate to the Xinzhou Directly-Administered State.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国解放之后，定襄县划归忻县专区。
description.en: After the liberation of the People's Republic of China, Dingxiang County was placed under the jurisdiction of Xinxian Special District.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，定襄县隶属忻县地区。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Dingxiang County belonged to Xinxian Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，定襄县曾隶属忻州地区。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Dingxiang County once belonged to Xinzhou Prefecture.
